Package javelin.controller.fight

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExhibitionFight
    Tournament event.
    Fight
    A battle scenario.
    IncursionFight  
    LocationFight  
    RandomDungeonEncounter
    Generates a harder battle than a RandomEncounter.
    RandomEncounter
    Fight that happens on the overworld map.
    Siege
    Battle when a player invades a hostile town.
    TempleEncounter
    Temple Fights are different from normal Dungeon encounters because the creatures are upgraded with Upgrades from their respective Realm.
    TownSiege
    Will place weaker monsters in front and stronger monsters in the back.
    TrainingSession
    A Fight that happens inside the TrainingHall.
